data.title: Comskip not detecting commercials
data.meta_description: Ok i have recorded onto a usb drive a series that has commercials in it, when I point MCEBuddy, and using comskip or showanalyzer, the commercials do not come out. Is this program not mean this way? Iâ€™m still a rookie on…
data.text:
i see sorry individual files

here it is for one episode
